motd:
Welcome to LunaSea v10.1.0!

This release contains a wide variety of bug fixes including a completely rewritten database interface to detect and be resilient against corruption.

changelog.message: prepare and show changelog on pre-release builds

database.message: correctly store manually ordered module list
detect and recover from database corruption
fallback to defaults on null values in profile
safely type indexer fields and headers
utilize stricter typing for module headers map
validate enabled profile exists on restore

sonarr.message: fanart image requests did not including headers

radarr.message: (queue) allow loading queue list when associated movie is not found

android.message: correctly handle back-button to open drawer on applicable routes

ui/ux.message: (lists) reorderable lists could not be reordered on some platforms
(timestamps) display 0-length timestamps as "0 Minutes" instead of "Under a Minute"

purchases.message: rewrite interface to in-app purchase APIs
